title: Using resmush
text: Compressing online jpg image:    Original picture (top) 178.7 Kb optimized picture (bottom) 45 Kb (Compression 74.8%). Click enlarge. quality compression can adjusted case jpg files using parameter qlty. However, recommended keep value 90 get good image quality.   Low quality image due high compression rate. functions return invisibly data set summary process. next example shows compressing local file.
code: library(resmush)  url <- paste0(   "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dieghernan/",   "resmush/main/img/jpg_example_original.jpg" )  resmush_url(url, outfile = "jpg_example_compress.jpg", overwrite = TRUE) #> ══ resmush summary ════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════ #> ℹ Input: 1 url with size 178.7 Kb #> ✔ Success for 1 url: Size now is 45 Kb (was 178.7 Kb). Saved 133.7 Kb (74.82%). #> See result in directory '.'. # Extreme case resmush_url(url,   outfile = "jpg_example_compress_low.jpg",   overwrite = TRUE, qlty = 3 ) #> ══ resmush summary ════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════ #> ℹ Input: 1 url with size 178.7 Kb #> ✔ Success for 1 url: Size now is 2.2 Kb (was 178.7 Kb). Saved 176.4 Kb (98.74%). #> See result in directory '.'. png_file <- system.file("extimg/example.png", package = "resmush")  # For the example, copy to a temporary file tmp_png <- tempfile(fileext = ".png") file.copy(png_file, tmp_png, overwrite = TRUE) #> [1] TRUE   summary <- resmush_file(tmp_png)  tibble::as_tibble(summary[, -c(1, 2)]) #> # A tibble: 1 × 6 #>   src_size dest_size compress_ratio notes src_bytes dest_bytes #>   <chr>    <chr>     <chr>          <chr>     <dbl>      <dbl> #> 1 239.9 Kb 70.7 Kb   70.54%         OK       245618      72356

title: Using resmush
text: alternatives optimizing images R: xfun::tinify() similar resmush_file() uses TinyPNG. API key required. xfun::optipng() compresses local files OptiPNG (needs installed locally). tinieR package jmablog. R package provides full interface TinyPNG. optout package @coolbutuseless. Similar xfun::optipng() options. Requires additional software installed locally. Table 1: R packages: Comparison alternatives optimizing images. Table 2: R packages: Formats admitted.

title: CONTRIBUTING
text: Small typos grammatical errors documentation may edited directly using GitHub web interface, long changes made source file. YES: edit roxygen comment .R file R/. : edit .Rd file man/.

title: CONTRIBUTING
text: make substantial pull request, always file issue make sure someone team agrees ’s problem. ’ve found bug, create associated issue illustrate bug minimal reprex.

title: CONTRIBUTING
text: recommend create Git branch pull request (PR). Look R-CMD-check build status making changes. recommend tidyverse style guide. can use styler package apply styles, please don’t restyle code nothing PR. use roxygen2. use testthat. Contributions test cases included easier accept. user-facing changes, add bullet top NEWS.md current development version header describing changes made followed GitHub username, links relevant issue(s)/PR(s).

what: resmush | Optimize and Compress Image Files with reSmush.it
title: resmush | Optimize and Compress Image Files with reSmush.it
text: resmush R package allow users optimize compress images using reSmush.. reSmush.free API provides image optimization, implemented WordPress, Drupal many . features reSmush.: Free optimization services, API key required. Optimize local online images. Image files supported: png, jpg/jpeg, gif, bmp, tiff, webp. Max image size: 5 Mb. PNGQuant: Strip unneeded chunks pngs, preserving full alpha transparency. JPEGOptim: Lossless optimization based optimizing Huffman tables. OptiPNG: png reducer used several online optimizers.

title: resmush | Optimize and Compress Image Files with reSmush.it
text: Install resmush CRAN : can install development version resmush GitHub : Alternatively, can install resmush using r-universe:
code: install.packages("resmush") remotes::install_github("dieghernan/resmush") # Install resmush in R: install.packages("resmush", repos = c(   "https://dieghernan.r-universe.dev",   "https://cloud.r-project.org" ))

title: resmush | Optimize and Compress Image Files with reSmush.it
text: Compressing online jpg image:    Original picture (top) 178.7 Kb optimized picture (bottom) 45 Kb (Compression 74.8%). Click enlarge. quality compression can adjusted case jpg files using parameter qlty. However, recommended keep value 90 get good image quality.   Low quality image due high compression rate. functions return invisibly data set summary process. next example shows compressing local file.
code: library(resmush)  url <- paste0(   "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dieghernan/",   "resmush/main/img/jpg_example_original.jpg" )  resmush_url(url, outfile = "man/figures/jpg_example_compress.jpg", overwrite = TRUE) #> ══ resmush summary ═════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════ #> ℹ Input: 1 url with size 178.7 Kb #> ✔ Success for 1 url: Size now is 45 Kb (was 178.7 Kb). Saved 133.7 Kb (74.82%). #> See result in directory 'man/figures'. # Extreme case resmush_url(url,   outfile = "man/figures/jpg_example_compress_low.jpg", overwrite = TRUE,   qlty = 3 ) #> ══ resmush summary ═════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════ #> ℹ Input: 1 url with size 178.7 Kb #> ✔ Success for 1 url: Size now is 2.2 Kb (was 178.7 Kb). Saved 176.4 Kb (98.74%). #> See result in directory 'man/figures'. png_file <- system.file("extimg/example.png", package = "resmush")  # For the example, copy to a temporary file tmp_png <- tempfile(fileext = ".png") file.copy(png_file, tmp_png, overwrite = TRUE) #> [1] TRUE summary <- resmush_file(tmp_png, overwrite = TRUE)  tibble::as_tibble(summary[, -c(1, 2)]) #> # A tibble: 1 × 6 #>   src_size dest_size compress_ratio notes src_bytes dest_bytes #>   <chr>    <chr>     <chr>          <chr>     <dbl>      <dbl> #> 1 239.9 Kb 70.7 Kb   70.54%         OK       245618      72356

what: Helper function for cleaning files created by resmush — resmush_clean_dir
title: Helper function for cleaning files created by resmush — resmush_clean_dir
text: Use caution. remove files computer. Clean directory (list directories) files created resmush_file().

title: Helper function for cleaning files created by resmush — resmush_clean_dir
Helper function for cleaning files created by resmush — resmush_clean_dir
text: dir character vector full path names. See list.files(), path argument. suffix Character, defaults "_resmush". See resmush_file(). recursive Logical. files deleted recurse directories?

title: Helper function for cleaning files created by resmush — resmush_clean_dir
text: Nothing. Produce messages information process.

title: Helper function for cleaning files created by resmush — resmush_clean_dir
code: # \donttest{ # Simple example  png_file <- system.file("extimg/example.png", package = "resmush")   # Copy to a temporary file with a given suffix suffix <- "_would_be_removed" tmp_png <- file.path(   tempdir(),   paste0("example", suffix, ".png") )  file.exists(tmp_png) #> [1] FALSE file.copy(png_file, tmp_png, overwrite = TRUE) #> [1] TRUE  file.exists(tmp_png) #> [1] TRUE  # This won't remove it resmush_clean_dir(tempdir()) #> ℹ No files to clean in C:\Users\RUNNER~1\AppData\Local\Temp\RtmpCMm5qd with suffix "_resmush\\.".  file.exists(tmp_png) #> [1] TRUE  # Need suffix resmush_clean_dir(tempdir(), suffix = suffix) #> ℹ Would remove 1 file: #> → C:\Users\RUNNER~1\AppData\Local\Temp\RtmpCMm5qd/example_would_be_removed.png  file.exists(tmp_png) #> [1] FALSE # }

what: Optimize files of several directories — resmush_dir
title: Optimize files of several directories — resmush_dir
text: Optimize local files directory (list directories) using  reSmush.API.

title: Optimize files of several directories — resmush_dir
code: resmush_dir(   dir,   ext = "\\.(png|jpe?g|bmp|gif|tif|webp)$",   suffix = "_resmush",   overwrite = FALSE,   progress = TRUE,   report = TRUE,   recursive = FALSE,   ... )

title: Optimize files of several directories — resmush_dir
text: dir Character vector characters representing paths local directories. ext regex indicating extensions files optimized. default value capture extensions admitted API. suffix Character, defaults "_resmush". default, new file suffix created directory (.e., optimized example.png example_resmush.png). Values "", NA NULL overwrite = TRUE. overwrite Logical. files dir overwritten? TRUE suffix ignored. progress Logical. Display progress bar needed. report Logical. Display summary report process console. See also Value. recursive Logical. dir file search recursive? See also list.files(). ... Arguments passed resmush_file qlty affects jpg files. Integer 0 100 indicating optimization level. optimal results use vales 90. exif_preserve Logical. Exif information () deleted? Default remove (.e. exif_preserve = FALSE).

title: Optimize files of several directories — resmush_dir
text: Writes disk optimized file API call successful directories specified dir. cases, (invisible) data frame summary process returned well.

title: Optimize files of several directories — resmush_dir
code: # \donttest{ # Get example dir and copy example_dir <- system.file("extimg", package = "resmush") temp_dir <- tempdir() file.copy(example_dir, temp_dir, recursive = TRUE) #> [1] TRUE  # Dest folder  dest_folder <- file.path(tempdir(), "extimg")   # Non-recursive resmush_dir(dest_folder) #> ℹ Resmushing 2 files #> 🕐  Go! | ■■■■■■■■■■■■■■■■□□□□□□□□□□□□□□□   50% [3ms] | ETA:  0s (1/2 files) #> 🕐  Go! | ■■■■■■■■■■■■■■■■■■■■■■■■■■■■■■■  100% [1.5s] | ETA:  0s (2/2 files) #>  #> ══ resmush summary ═════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════ #> ℹ Input: 2 files with size 340.2 Kb #> ✔ Success for 2 files: Size now is 153.8 Kb (was 340.2 Kb). Saved 186.4 Kb (54.79%). #> See results in directory #> C:/Users/RUNNER~1/AppData/Local/Temp/RtmpCMm5qd/extimg. resmush_clean_dir(dest_folder) #> ℹ Would remove 2 files: #> → C:\Users\RUNNER~1\AppData\Local\Temp\RtmpCMm5qd/extimg/example_resmush.jpg #> → C:\Users\RUNNER~1\AppData\Local\Temp\RtmpCMm5qd/extimg/example_resmush.png  # Recursive summary <- resmush_dir(dest_folder, recursive = TRUE) #> ℹ Resmushing 5 files #> 🕐  Go! | ■■■■■■■■■■■■■■■■■■■□□□□□□□□□□□□   60% [1.8s] | ETA:  1s (3/5 files) #> 🕐  Go! | ■■■■■■■■■■■■■■■■■■■■■■■■■■■■■■■  100% [2.9s] | ETA:  0s (5/5 files) #>  #> ══ resmush summary ═════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════ #> ℹ Input: 5 files with size 401.7 Kb #> ✔ Success for 5 files: Size now is 173.5 Kb (was 401.7 Kb). Saved 228.2 Kb (56.81%). #> See results in directories #> C:/Users/RUNNER~1/AppData/Local/Temp/RtmpCMm5qd/extimg, #> C:/Users/RUNNER~1/AppData/Local/Temp/RtmpCMm5qd/extimg/top1/nested, #> C:/Users/RUNNER~1/AppData/Local/Temp/RtmpCMm5qd/extimg/top1, and #> C:/Users/RUNNER~1/AppData/Local/Temp/RtmpCMm5qd/extimg/top2.  # Same info in the invisible df summary[, -c(1, 2)] #>   src_size dest_size compress_ratio notes src_bytes dest_bytes #> 1 100.4 Kb   83.2 Kb         17.15%    OK    102796      85164 #> 2 239.9 Kb   70.7 Kb         70.54%    OK    245618      72356 #> 3  17.8 Kb      6 Kb         66.48%    OK     18214       6105 #> 4  25.9 Kb    7.7 Kb         70.09%    OK     26499       7926 #> 5  17.8 Kb      6 Kb         66.48%    OK     18214       6105  # Display with png if (require("png", quietly = TRUE)) {   a_png <- grepl("png$", summary$dest_img)   my_png <- png::readPNG(summary[a_png, ]$dest_img[2])   grid::grid.raster(my_png) }   # Clean up example unlink(dest_folder, force = TRUE, recursive = TRUE) # }

title: Optimize a local file — resmush_file
text: Optimize local images using reSmush.API.

title: Optimize a local file — resmush_file
code: resmush_file(   file,   suffix = "_resmush",   overwrite = FALSE,   progress = TRUE,   report = TRUE,   qlty = 92,   exif_preserve = FALSE )

title: Optimize a local file — resmush_file
text: file Path paths local files. reSmush can optimize following image files: png jpg/jpeg gif bmp tiff webp suffix Character, defaults "_resmush". default, new file suffix created directory file. (.e., optimized example.png example_resmush.png). Values "", NA NULL overwrite = TRUE. overwrite Logical. file file overwritten? TRUE suffix ignored. progress Logical. Display progress bar needed. report Logical. Display summary report process console. See also Value. qlty affects jpg files. Integer 0 100 indicating optimization level. optimal results use vales 90. exif_preserve Logical. Exif information () deleted? Default remove (.e. exif_preserve = FALSE).

title: Optimize a local file — resmush_file
text: Writes disk optimized file API call successful directory file. option report = TRUE summary report displayed console. cases, (invisible) data frame summary process used generate report returned.

title: Optimize a local file — resmush_file
code: # \donttest{ png_file <- system.file("extimg/example.png", package = "resmush")  # For the example, copy to a temporary file tmp_png <- tempfile(fileext = ".png")  file.copy(png_file, tmp_png, overwrite = TRUE) #> [1] TRUE  resmush_file(tmp_png) #> ══ resmush summary ═════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════ #> ℹ Input: 1 file with size 239.9 Kb #> ✔ Success for 1 file: Size now is 70.7 Kb (was 239.9 Kb). Saved 169.2 Kb (70.54%). #> See result in directory C:/Users/RUNNER~1/AppData/Local/Temp/RtmpCMm5qd.  # Several paths jpg_file <- system.file("extimg/example.jpg", package = "resmush") tmp_jpg <- tempfile(fileext = ".jpg")  file.copy(jpg_file, tmp_jpg, overwrite = TRUE) #> [1] TRUE  # Output summary in console summary <- resmush_file(c(tmp_png, tmp_jpg)) #> 🕐  Go! | ■■■■■■■■■■■■■■■■□□□□□□□□□□□□□□□   50% [2ms] | ETA:  0s (1/2 files) #> 🕐  Go! | ■■■■■■■■■■■■■■■■■■■■■■■■■■■■■■■  100% [1.1s] | ETA:  0s (2/2 files) #>  #> ══ resmush summary ═════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════ #> ℹ Input: 2 files with size 340.2 Kb #> ✔ Success for 2 files: Size now is 153.8 Kb (was 340.2 Kb). Saved 186.4 Kb (54.79%). #> See results in directory C:/Users/RUNNER~1/AppData/Local/Temp/RtmpCMm5qd.  # Similar info in an (invisible) data frame as a result summary #>                                                                      src_img #> 1  C:\\Users\\RUNNER~1\\AppData\\Local\\Temp\\RtmpCMm5qd\\filed9858e3cba.png #> 2 C:\\Users\\RUNNER~1\\AppData\\Local\\Temp\\RtmpCMm5qd\\filed9847572cc8.jpg #>                                                                             dest_img #> 1  C:\\Users\\RUNNER~1\\AppData\\Local\\Temp\\RtmpCMm5qd\\filed9858e3cba_resmush.png #> 2 C:\\Users\\RUNNER~1\\AppData\\Local\\Temp\\RtmpCMm5qd\\filed9847572cc8_resmush.jpg #>   src_size dest_size compress_ratio notes src_bytes dest_bytes #> 1 239.9 Kb   70.7 Kb         70.54%    OK    245618      72356 #> 2 100.4 Kb   83.2 Kb         17.15%    OK    102796      85164    # Display with png if (require("png", quietly = TRUE)) {   my_png <- png::readPNG(summary$dest_img[1])   grid::grid.raster(my_png) }   # With parameters resmush_file(tmp_jpg) #> ══ resmush summary ═════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════ #> ℹ Input: 1 file with size 100.4 Kb #> ✔ Success for 1 file: Size now is 83.2 Kb (was 100.4 Kb). Saved 17.2 Kb (17.15%). #> See result in directory C:/Users/RUNNER~1/AppData/Local/Temp/RtmpCMm5qd. resmush_file(tmp_jpg, qlty = 10) #> ══ resmush summary ═════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════ #> ℹ Input: 1 file with size 100.4 Kb #> ✔ Success for 1 file: Size now is 6.4 Kb (was 100.4 Kb). Saved 94 Kb (93.61%). #> See result in directory C:/Users/RUNNER~1/AppData/Local/Temp/RtmpCMm5qd. # }

title: Optimize an online file — resmush_url
text: Optimize download online image using reSmush.API.

title: Optimize an online file — resmush_url
code: resmush_url(   url,   outfile = file.path(tempdir(), basename(url)),   overwrite = FALSE,   progress = TRUE,   report = TRUE,   qlty = 92,   exif_preserve = FALSE )

title: Optimize an online file — resmush_url
text: url url vector urls pointing hosted image files. reSmush can optimize following image files: png jpg/jpeg gif bmp tiff webp outfile Path paths optimized files store disk. default, temporary files (see tempfile()) basename() file provided url created. length url parameter. overwrite Logical. outfile overwritten (already exists)? FALSE outfile exists create copy numerical suffix (.e. <outfile>.png, <outfile>_01.png, etc.). progress Logical. Display progress bar needed. report Logical. Display summary report process console. See also Value. qlty affects jpg files. Integer 0 100 indicating optimization level. optimal results use vales 90. exif_preserve Logical. Exif information () deleted? Default remove (.e. exif_preserve = FALSE).

title: Optimize an online file — resmush_url
text: Writes disk optimized file API call successful. cases, (invisible) data frame summary process returned well. value vector outfile duplicated, resmush_url() rename output suffix _01. _02, etc.

title: Optimize an online file — resmush_url
code: # \donttest{  # Base url base_url <- "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dieghernan/resmush/main/inst/"  png_url <- paste0(base_url, "/extimg/example.png") resmush_url(png_url) #> ══ resmush summary ═════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════ #> ℹ Input: 1 url with size 239.9 Kb #> ✔ Success for 1 url: Size now is 70.7 Kb (was 239.9 Kb). Saved 169.2 Kb (70.54%). #> See result in directory C:/Users/RUNNER~1/AppData/Local/Temp/RtmpCMm5qd.  # Several urls jpg_url <- paste0(base_url, "/extimg/example.jpg")   summary <- resmush_url(c(png_url, jpg_url)) #> 🕐  Go! | ■■■■■■■■■■■■■■■■□□□□□□□□□□□□□□□   50% [2ms] | ETA:  0s (1/2 urls) #> 🕐  Go! | ■■■■■■■■■■■■■■■■■■■■■■■■■■■■■■■  100% [1.2s] | ETA:  0s (2/2 urls) #>  #> ══ resmush summary ═════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════ #> ℹ Input: 2 urls with size 340.2 Kb #> ✔ Success for 2 urls: Size now is 153.8 Kb (was 340.2 Kb). Saved 186.4 Kb (54.79%). #> See results in directory C:/Users/RUNNER~1/AppData/Local/Temp/RtmpCMm5qd.  # Returns an (invisible) data frame with a summary of the process summary #>                                                                              src_img #> 1 https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dieghernan/resmush/main/inst//extimg/example.png #> 2 https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dieghernan/resmush/main/inst//extimg/example.jpg #>                                                               dest_img src_size #> 1 C:\\Users\\RUNNER~1\\AppData\\Local\\Temp\\RtmpCMm5qd/example_01.png 239.9 Kb #> 2    C:\\Users\\RUNNER~1\\AppData\\Local\\Temp\\RtmpCMm5qd/example.jpg 100.4 Kb #>   dest_size compress_ratio notes src_bytes dest_bytes #> 1   70.7 Kb         70.54%    OK    245618      72356 #> 2   83.2 Kb         17.15%    OK    102796      85164  # Display with png if (require("png", quietly = TRUE)) {   my_png <- png::readPNG(summary$dest_img[1])   grid::grid.raster(my_png) }   # Use with jpg and parameters resmush_url(jpg_url) #> ══ resmush summary ═════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════ #> ℹ Input: 1 url with size 100.4 Kb #> ✔ Success for 1 url: Size now is 83.2 Kb (was 100.4 Kb). Saved 17.2 Kb (17.15%). #> See result in directory C:/Users/RUNNER~1/AppData/Local/Temp/RtmpCMm5qd. resmush_url(jpg_url, qlty = 10) #> ══ resmush summary ═════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════ #> ℹ Input: 1 url with size 100.4 Kb #> ✔ Success for 1 url: Size now is 6.4 Kb (was 100.4 Kb). Saved 94 Kb (93.61%). #> See result in directory C:/Users/RUNNER~1/AppData/Local/Temp/RtmpCMm5qd. # }

title: resmush 0.1.1
text: Update docs.

title: resmush 0.1.0
text: CRAN release: 2024-02-02 Accepted CRAN. Now resmush uses httr2 instead httr. Add DOI: https://doi.org/10.5281/zenodo.10556679. resmush_file(), resmush_dir() resmush_url() gain new argument overwrite. New arguments progress report. Deprecated verbose argument. resmush_clean_dir() shows messages summary process. New packages Suggests examples: png, grid.

title: resmush 0.0.1
text: Initial version.
